Package Name: mcp-google-workspace
Published on PyPI: https://pypi.org/project/mcp-google-workspace/

To add it to Claude Desktop, run this command in your terminal:

claude mcp add mcp-google-workspace -- uvx mcp-google-workspace --gauth-file ~/.config/mcp-google/.gauth.json --accounts-file ~/.config/mcp-google/.accounts.json

After running this command, restart Claude Desktop with:
claude restart

The package is published under the name "mcp-google-workspace" on PyPI.
You can install it directly with pip:
pip install mcp-google-workspace

Or with uv:
uv pip install mcp-google-workspace
